data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Poolprasert, Pisit, Edgerly, Janice S. (2014): Description of four new species of the genus Ptilocerembia Friederichs, 1923 (Embioptera: Ptilocerembiidae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 3852 (3): 359-372, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.3.5
